reasoning: ACS encompasses STEMI, NSTEMI, and unstable angina. Global incidence estimated at ~90 per 100k person-years based on WHO cardiovascular disease data circa 2005. High variation: 150-200 per 100k in developed countries, 50-70 in developing regions.
source: Yusuf S et al. (2001). Global burden of cardiovascular diseases. Circulation. 104(22):2746-2753
